last_episode_to_air.name: The Stony Trip
last_episode_to_air.overview: The gang takes a trip with Saina's boyfriend, everyone lands up getting stoned and no romance works out. To everyone's surprise Abhay and Naicy land up as a couple.

name: Kota Toppers
overview: Six students belonging to diverse backgrounds arrive in Kota with aspirations to crack the IIT entrance exam and encounter various challenges.
